summary: A unique greatsword made from the head of a snake by the hands of a 2nd era Argonian blacksmith.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=4][color=#76923c][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=4][color=#76923c][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=4][color=#76923c][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][img]http://images.cooltext.com/3933307.png[/img][/center][color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Description[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Viper's Tongue is a unique greatsword created with a rare white snake head.  It was requested to be made in the 2nd era by an argonian king when he needed the sword for a battle against the redguards.  The king was killed in battle and his killer supposedly stole the sword and took it with him on his travels around Skyrim.  The legend states that the sword has rubies for the eyes of the infamous snake, colored leather strips for wielding the weapon and strong shinning metal for the long and deathly blade.[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Location[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]The sword can be found at the site of the Wreck of the Winter War at the bow of the ship next to a frozen corpse.[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Installation[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Make sure the VipersTongue.esp is checked in the Launcher[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
=================
Un-Installation:
=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Delete all the files that contain information about the mod[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Uncheck the VipersTongue.esp is checked in the Skyrim Launcher[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Permissions[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]If you want to use this mod in your own mod you will have to ask me first.[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]=================[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]For the cubemap texture: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34034/? [/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]For the snakehead: http://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/398555[/size][/color]
[color=#76923c][size=4]The artist that requested his sword in Skyrim: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/8795339-dimitian/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/8795339-dimitian/[/url][/size][/color]
[color=#9bbb59][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=4]
[/size][/font][/color]
[center][color=#9bbb59][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=4]
[/size][/font][/color][/center]
author: MJAB98
